Shockwave:


Shockwave was closing in on the target.  Unfortunately, his jet mode had 
drained most of his energies.  Descending rapidly, Shockwave could see the 
crashed ship.  It wasn't really big.  But it may or may not have an energon 
dispensor.  If it did...he may be able to get himself some energy.  Slamming 
to the ground, he slid, stopping after he slammed cone first into the crashed 
ship.  Transforming to robot mode slowly and painfully, he got up, raising 
the pistol embedded into his right hand.  Stepping slowly to the entrance of 
the shuttle, he turned the coner, hand-pistol raised.  Looking around past 
the corner, he saw nothing.  "It's clear." he said aloud, quickly spotting an 
energon dispensor.  Then a large room.  

"A CR chamber!" hey yelled.  "Perfect!" the doors to the room swooshed open, 
revealing where a CR chamber would be.  But evidently someone had ripped it 
out of the ship.  "SLAG!" Shockwave yelled, raising his pistol-hand firing a 
bolt off at where the CR chamber had been, blowing a small dent in the wall. 
He calmed down, quickly disposing of his emotions.

Going back to the energon dispensor, it had three days worth.  Significantly 
less than the normal, but it would do for now.  Letting inetrnal repairs kick 
in, he drained the energon from the dispensor.  Then, with his hand, he 
ripped it out of the wall. He set it down, getting a few tools from subspace 
as his right laser-hand became a white hand.  He began work on the dispensor.
